A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
My SPOILER FREE movie review for Star Wars The Last Jedi.

Was it the best Star Wars movie ever? No
Was it better than The Force Awakens? Yes
Did I have a great time watching it? Yes
There are a few jaw dropping moments that you want to avoid spoilers for. 
A good mix of humour\, serious emotion and action.
It made me laugh\, gasp and cheer. 
The CGI is amazing as is the music.
Mark Hamill and Carrie Fisher were great. 
Will I go see it again? Yes
It's definitely a "must see at the cinema experience"
Overall\, pretty good but had one or two questionable 
plot/character choices. 
I liked it and give it 8 out of 10.
